content.text:
[@NinjaTrappeur](@rGGlF9/6AAMuxpEhznHTpG8XTS0TJHGJ1k4qfgfJCwM=.ed25519) 

I think that's a reference to [ssb-ooo](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-ooo/), which can retrieve messages out-of-order if the client uses the plugin. The benefit is that you can ask your peers for a specific message without knowing the author, but the downside is that you can't prove the entire chain of messages from the author's root post.
